content: oh la la make your furriest friend look chic and cozy in this attractive knit dog coat designed in red heart heat wave the striped body is worked in the round with solid picked-up sleeves and bands this is a great pattern to practice simple shaping and color changes or for a quick and easy project that pampers your pooch your pup will be the most fashionable dog at the park materials set of 4 size u s 8 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles size u s 8 5 mm circular knitting needle 16 40 5 cm long sizes to fit dog chest measurement s 12 30 5 cm m 15 38 cm l 18 45 5 cm xl 22 56 cm
